register.description: Core n Receive Threshold Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Threshold Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the receive threshold interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_RX_THRESH_PULSE

register.description: Core n Receive Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the rx interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_RX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Transmit Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the tx interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_TX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Misc Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Misc Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the miscellaneous interrupt (stat_pend, host_pend, mdio_linkint, mdio_userint) that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_Misc_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Receive Threshold Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Threshold Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the receive threshold interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_RX_THRESH_PULSE

register.description: Core n Receive Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the rx interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_RX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Transmit Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the tx interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_TX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Misc Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Misc Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the miscellaneous interrupt (stat_pend, host_pend, mdio_linkint, mdio_userint) that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_Misc_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Receive Threshold Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Threshold Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the receive threshold interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_RX_THRESH_PULSE

register.description: Core n Receive Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the rx interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_RX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Transmit Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the bit in the tx interrupt that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_TX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Misc Interrupt Enable Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Misc Enable - Each bit in this register corresponds to the miscellaneous interrupt (stat_pend, host_pend, mdio_linkint, mdio_userint) that is enabled to generate an interrupt on C0_Misc_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Receive Threshold Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Threshold Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the receive threshold interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_RX_THRESH_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Receive Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the Rx interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_RX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Transmit Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the Tx interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_TX_PULSE .

register.description: Core n Misc Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Misc Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this register corresponds to the miscellaneous interrupt (stat_pend, host_pend, mdio_linkint, mdio_userint) that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_MISC_PULSE .

register.description: Core n Receive Threshold Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Threshold Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the receive threshold interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_RX_THRESH_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Receive Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the Rx interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_RX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Transmit Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the Tx interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_TX_PULSE .

register.description: Core n Misc Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Misc Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this register corresponds to the miscellaneous interrupt (stat_pend, host_pend, mdio_linkint, mdio_userint) that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_MISC_PULSE .

register.description: Core n Receive Threshold Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Threshold Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the receive threshold interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_RX_THRESH_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Receive Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the Rx interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_RX_PULSE.

register.description: Core n Transmit Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this read only register corresponds to the bit in the Tx interrupt that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_TX_PULSE .

register.description: Core n Misc Interrupt Masked Interrupt Status Register, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Misc Masked Interrupt Status - Each bit in this register corresponds to the miscellaneous interrupt (stat_pend, host_pend, mdio_linkint, mdio_userint) that is enabled and generating an interrupt on C0_MISC_PULSE .

register.description: Core 0 Receive Interrupts Per Millisecond, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Interrupts per Millisecond - The maximum number of interrupts per millisecond generated on C0_RX_PULSE if pacing is enabled for this interrupt.

register.description: Core 0 Transmit Interrupts Per Millisecond, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Interrupts per Millisecond - The maximum number of interrupts per millisecond generated on C0_TX_PULSE if pacing is enabled for this interrupt.

register.description: Core 0 Receive Interrupts Per Millisecond, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Interrupts per Millisecond - The maximum number of interrupts per millisecond generated on C0_RX_PULSE if pacing is enabled for this interrupt.

register.description: Core 0 Transmit Interrupts Per Millisecond, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Interrupts per Millisecond - The maximum number of interrupts per millisecond generated on C0_TX_PULSE if pacing is enabled for this interrupt.

register.description: Core 0 Receive Interrupts Per Millisecond, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Receive Interrupts per Millisecond - The maximum number of interrupts per millisecond generated on C0_RX_PULSE if pacing is enabled for this interrupt.

register.description: Core 0 Transmit Interrupts Per Millisecond, n = 0, 1 and 2

bitfield.description: Core 0 Transmit Interrupts per Millisecond - The maximum number of interrupts per millisecond generated on C0_TX_PULSE if pacing is enabled for this interrupt.

register.description: Identification and Version register
Software Reset Register

bitfield.description: Software reset - Writing a one to this bit causes the CPGMACSS_S logic to be reset (INT, REGS, CPPI). Software reset occurs on the clock following the register bit write.

register.description: Emulation Control Register
Interrupt Control Register

bitfield.description: Interrupt Test - Test bit to the interrupt pacing blocks
Interrupt Counter Prescaler - The number of VBUSP_CLK periods in 4us
